mapper.select: SELECT ba.`code` FROM base_user_role bur LEFT JOIN base_role br ON br.id = bur.role_id and br.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN base_role_authority bra ON bra.role_id = br.id and bra.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN base_authority ba ON ba.id = bra.authority_id and ba.is_deleted = 0 WHERE bur.id = #{id};
